client_profile.text: 24 лет, женщина. одинокий посетитель. целевые калории ≈1888 ккал.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello! Would you like to order a Butter Chicken Grilled Burger or Butter Paneer Grilled Burger? We also have McNuggets and Fries if you're interested.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Butter Chicken Grilled Burger. No McNuggets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Кассир: Great choice! Would you like to add any drinks or a dessert? We have Cold Coffee, Iced Tea, and McFlurry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Кассир: Perfect! You've ordered a Butter Chicken Grilled Burger with Cola. Is there anything else you'd like to add?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Кассир: Кассир: Alright, you've ordered a Butter Chicken Grilled Burger and Cola. Thank you for your order!
